title: Trump Warns Iran With Military Muscle, but Risks a Regional War
summary_full: Iran’s Islamic Republic, weakened by airstrikes in June and huge popular unrest, warns that it will strike back hard if attacked by the United States. This time, Iran may mean it.
summary_public: Iran’s Islamic Republic, weakened by airstrikes in June and huge popular unrest, warns that it will strike back hard if attacked by the United States. This time, Iran may mean it.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump Warns Iran With Military Muscle, but Risks a Regional War
